definitions.title: terr.
definitions.body: Judah (treated Ge 29:35, Ge 49:8 (q. v. infr.) as if der. fr. Hoph. of [[ידה]] = praised, object of praise (on [[ה]] cf. Hiph. [[אֲהוֹדֶָנּוּ]] Ps 28:7, [[יְהוֹדֶה]] Ne 11:17), but this dubious; relation to [[יְהֻד]], II. [[יְהוּדִית]]: unexpl.; v. further Jastr:JBL xii, 1898, 61 ff.; As. Ia-u-du, of land; Ia-u-da-ai, Judaean COT:Gloss)—

definitions.title: I. n.pr.m. 1.
definitions.body: son of Jacob and Leah, expl. by Leah's words I will praise ´[[י]] Ge 29:35 (J) ; cf. Jacob's prediction, thy brethren shall praise thee Ge 49:8 (poem in JE), see also v:Ge 49:9, v:Ge 49:10; elsewh. Ge 37:26, Ge 38:1 + 14 t. Ge 38, Ge 43:3, Ge 43:8, Ge 44:14, Ge 44:16, Ge 44:18, Ge 46:28 (all J), Ge 35:23 (P), 1Ch 2:1, 1Ch 2:3, Ru 4:12; [[בְּנֵי יְהוּדָה]] sons of Judah Ge 46:12, Nu 26:19 (P), 1Ch 2:3, 1Ch 2:4, 1Ch 4:1.

tribe descended from Judah De 33:7 (poem), Nu 1:7 (P), De 27:12 +; [[בְּנֵי יהודה]] Nu 1:26, Jos 14:6 (D), Ju Jdg 1:8 +; [[שֵׁבֶט יהודה]] Jos 7:16 (J), 1Ki 12:20, 2Ki 17:18, Ps 78:68; [[מַטֵּה בְנֵי יהודה]] Jos 15:1, Jos 15:20, Jos 15:21, Jos 21:9 (all P), 1Ch 6:50; elsewhere [[מַטֵּה]] [[יהודה]] Ex 31:2, Ex 35:30, Ex 38:22, Nu 1:27, Nu 7:12, Nu 13:6, Nu 34:19, Jos 7:1, Jos 7:18, Jos 21:4 (all P); [[אישׁ יהודה]] Ju Jdg 15:20 +; [[אנשׁי יהודה]] 2Sa 2:4 + , (cf. amelûti [ṣabê] Ia-u-du Tel el-Amarna:No. 39 Jastr:JBL xii, 1893, 64).

nation, of southern kingdom under dynasty of David, as distinguished from northern kingdom of Ephraim or Israel: Ho 4:15, Je 2:28, 2Ch 12:12 + ; of the returned exiles Ne 4:4; [[עַם יהודה]] 2Ki 14:21 = 2Ch 26:1, Je 25:1, Je 25:2, Ezr 4:4; [[בְּנֵי יהודה]] Ho 2:2, Je 7:30, 2Ch 13:18, 2Ch 25:12, 2Ch 28:10; [[בֵּית יהודה]] Ho 1:7, Je 3:18, Ez Eze 4:6 +; [[מַלְכוּת]] [[יהודה]] 2Ch 11:17; personified, ´[[בַּת י]] La 1:15, La 2:2, La 2:5.

definitions.title: II. n.pr.terr.
definitions.body: land of Judah, f. Is 7:6, Je 23:6 = Je 33:16, Joe 4:30, Ps 114:2 +; [[ארץ יְהוּדָה]] 1Sa 22:5, 2Ki 23:24 +; [[אדמת יהודה]] Is 19:17; [[עָרֵי יהודה]] 2Sa 2:1, 1Ki 12:17, 2Ki 18:13, 2Ki 23:5, 2Ki 23:8, Is 40:9, Is 44:26, Zec 1:12, Ps 69:36, La 5:11; elsewhere 15 t. Chr., 23 t. Jer.; [[בִּיהודה]] Ju Jdg 15:9 +; [[מיהודה]] 1Ki 13:1 +; [[הר יהודה]] the hill-country of Judah Jos 11:21(D), Jos 20:7, Jos 21:11 (P), 2Ch 27:4; [[נֶגֶב יהודה]] the south (country) of Judah 1Sa 27:10, 2Sa 24:7; [[מדבר יהודה]] Ju Jdg 1:16, Ps 63:1 (title).
